entry.name: pageshow
entry.title: pageshow
entry.desc: Triggered on the "toPage" after the transition animation has completed.

longdesc.strong: Note: The triggering of this event is deprecated as of jQuery Mobile 1.4.0. It will no longer be triggered in 1.5.0.
longdesc.p: The replacement for is pagecontainershow. In jQuery Mobile 1.4.0, the two events are identical except for their name.
